lenders.loan_because: I loan because $25 for an entrepreneur of Kiva generate much more "wellbeing" than $25 spent for another T-shirt, a new CD or five cups of coffee. lenders.occupational_info: I create and run simulation games for adults and school children that let them experience. sustainable development. lenders.name: Nam
lenders.loan_because:
With Kiva, I help entrepreneurs start a business, nourish their family, or pay for emergencies.  All of this for no-to-low overhead cost. 

If we don't help those in impoverished areas, then the alternative is for them to rely on outrageous loans that burden them from successfully starting their business.  

For some background Information, here's a TED video:
http://www.ted.com/talks/jessica_jackley_poverty_money_and_love.html

lenders.occupational_info: I'm pursuing a PhD in computer science. That entails 5-6 years of research on a particular topic. In my case, I'm studying the application of artificial intelligence techniques to games. That may sound a little abstract or even downright callous, given the problems that the world faces, but I hope that the techniques that I'll be studying, including real-time planning techniques, can be applied to other domains fruitfully.

lenders.name: firstcentralmortgagefund
lenders.loan_because: First Central Mortgage Funding Inc has perfected the alternative approach to lending that allows the firm to stand out in the competitive mortgage and real estate financing industry. Based out of Toronto, Ontario, First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. funds projects other lending institutions chained to traditional financing industry standards usually let pass.
lenders.occupational_info:
As an alternative financing source, First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. focuses on the human side of an investment, which allows it to make lending decisions other companies normally ignore. 

The key to First Central Mortgage Funding’s alternative funding success is based on its unique lending process; it breaks down transactions into a simple screening procedure that takes into account the specific needs of each borrower. Larger financing companies exercise broad numeric assessments to make lending decisions, but First Central Mortgage Funding utilizes simplified, yet extremely case-specific, financing methods. 

First Central Mortgage Funding analyzes its clients funding applications, issuing a commitment only after extensive due diligence is conducted. After an investment is approved, the borrower has the chance to review the commitment and decide if they want to accept the financing terms presented by First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. The simple financing system revolves around personalized interactions between First Central Mortgage Funding and its clients. First Central Mortgage Funding Inc. may not process lending solutions as quickly as other financing companies that absentmindedly pump out transactions, but careful pacing ensures that the individual needs of both parties are met and agreed upon, creating more personalized financing options. 

First Central Mortgage Funding specializes in a wide variety of lending transactions, including home mortgages, short-term bridge financing, and multi-national retail development. Bridge Loans are short-term loans that are used for temporary financing while larger, long-term financing deals are made. This type of loan adds a degree of flexibility to lending transactions that help the borrower initiate their desired project. First Central Mortgage Funding’s ability to use bridge loans as temporary financing solutions is just one example of the company's numerous innovative financing solutions.

First Central Mortgage Funding does not entertain applications from the mortgager directly; our deals are funded only through licensed mortgage brokers. Please have your broker contact us on your behalf.

Visit us at http://www.firstcentralmortgagefunding.com

lenders.name: Ralf
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people directly with a small amount of money.

lenders.name: Pattie Meyers
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to still be here and my passion is to help others in their journey.  As a three time breast cancer and brain surgery survivor, I recognize that each day spent on this earth is a gift and I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am the founder of three, multifaceted businesses in the last few years all under the name of The PM Companies, which targets both Orange and Los Angeles County areas.  They include Balanced Sole Reflexology (www.BalancedSoleReflexology.com), Pattie’s Pet Care and House Sitting (www.PattiesPetCareAndHouseSitting.com) and an online travel site, A1 Travel and Fun (www.A1TravelAndFun.com).  

As a result of my health issues and experiences, I am especially passionate about health care and women’s issues.  I strive to educate my clients of the importance of health, stressing relaxation, sleeping better, eating healthy, exercising and learning how to be in tuned to one’s body and what it is telling you.   

Knowing that reflexology can make a difference in the well being of one’s life, some of the ways I give back is by being a volunteer in the community.  I perform reflexology for women at an abuse shelter, chemotherapy patients and hospice patients allowing them to relax with reflexology and a tender touch.  I also volunteer at the Compton Work Day project, Relay for Life events and am currently working on getting clearance to perform reflexology on firefighters during wild land fire fighting emergencies.  In addition, I give educational talks at a variety of forums to help others learn the importance of taking care of oneself.

My love of animals has drawn me to care for pets while the owners are on vacation or business trips.  My pet care and house sitting business allows owners to feel safe while out of town and enjoy their time away knowing that I'm taking care of their precious pets.  I give them undivided attention and often go beyond the call of duty simply because I love animals and treat them as I would my own.  Owners have expressed amazement when meeting me since their pets go to me without hesitation unlike other strangers.  A true testament of my natural love of animals.

A1 Travel And Fun is an online - one stop center for all of your travel, entertainment or specialty needs.  Most anything you can do on line is now available at one site.  Whether that be travel, dinner, theater, racing, concerts, shopping, etc.

I have gone through personal health issues that would make some want to give up on life.  My battle with cancer on three separate occasions made me stronger and has motivated me to share my life story with others in order to give them hope.  My struggles after brain surgery changed my life course because it limited me in ways where I could no longer function as before, but I refuse to allow it to define me. Instead, I take these adversities and newfound skills into the community to help others lives each day hoping to make a difference.  I want my actions to make a meaningful imprint on the future of my community and local businesses.  My intent is to set a good example to others and inspire many by sharing my life story and my desire to make a difference.
